snippet.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a look at gameplay in this latest trailer for the first-person game, Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2, ahead of its launch on June 4, 2021 for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X and S, Xbox One, and PC.

In Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2, players take on the role of contract sniper assassin Raven, and must track and eliminate targets using different approaches. The game features 1000m+ extreme-range sniping, a new single-player campaign set in modern day Middle East with 5 sandbox maps, and more.

#IGN #Gaming
